vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συναπάγω [ᾰγ],
lead away with or together, τινι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 carry off with, οἱ γλυκεῖς οἶνοι.. οὐ συναπάγουσιν ἑαυτοῖς τοὺς χολώδεις χυμούς [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II passive, τοὺς συναπαχθέντας ἡμῖν γεωργούς arrested with us, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__II.2 metaphorically, to be led away likewise, [NT]
__II.3 ={συμπεριφέρομαι} (συμπεριφέρω [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be ledlead away, carried off; to associate with (the lowly)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be ledlead away, carried off; to associate with (the lowly)
to lead, or carry away with; to seduce; passive to be led away ; to associate with (the lowly)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ser llevado o arrastrado, dejarse llevar ; estar asociado con la gente humilde o estar trabajando en tareas humildes (ROM.12:16)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bị thu hút; bị lôi cuốn. σύν (G4862) + ἀπάγω (G520)
